text: [Chapter 14a] [Bipole Sea, Bipole Sea]
???: It seems like Diver Neville has lost...
???: Well then, I guess it's my turn!
???: Everyone, CHARGE!!!
[Bonus Conversation Unlocked]

speaker: left
text: Hey.

speaker: right
text: Hey.

speaker: left
text: Remember that time I shot my eye?

speaker: right
text: Yes, very clearly.

speaker: right
text: It was the first day of combat academy when we were being tested on how well we could use the weapons.

speaker: right
text: And you somehow shot your own eye when trying to use the bow.

speaker: right
text: Afterwards, you drew that hitmarker on on your eyepatch.

speaker: left
text: Correct corrrect correct!

speaker: left
text: And I was just thinking, what would my life have been like if I was able to use the bow but was unable to use my fists?

speaker: left
text: Would I have punched my own eye out?

speaker: right
text: Don't ask me, I still have no idea how you would even shoot your own eye.

speaker: left
text: Well, it's one of the only things I've ever succesfully hit in the center.

speaker: left
text: Anyways, I'm glad I was sent to the hospital before I had to do the dagger testing.

speaker: left
text: That could have gone very bad.

speaker: right
text: Honestly, I have no idea how you've made it into the Elemental Offense Squad not knowing how to use any weapons.

speaker: left
text: Some may call it luck, I call it fate.

speaker: right
text: It was fate that you have no combat ability outside of punching?

speaker: left
text: It's fate that I'm this gamer (insert explosion) transition).
[Wodahs and Repins leveled up!]
[Bonus Conversation Unlocked]

speaker: left
text: FAEL!

speaker: right
text: Huh?

speaker: left
text: How does one use a bow?

speaker: right
text: You don't know how to use a bow?

speaker: left
text: Let me be more precise...

speaker: left
text: How does one not shoot themself when firing a bow?

speaker: right
text: How DOES one shoot themself when firing a bow?

speaker: left
text: ...very epically.

speaker: right
text: Wait, don't tell me you've...

speaker: left
text: FAKE NEWS!!!

speaker: left
text: I would NEVER shoot myself with a bow!

speaker: left
text: ...or atleast un-epically.

speaker: right
text: Wodahs, it was not very "epic".

speaker: left
text: Na... nani!?

speaker: left
text: How could that not be epic??????

speaker: right
text: You shot yourself with your own bow, how is that even remotely "epic"?

speaker: left
text: M... my... social status.....

speaker: left
text: It just dropped... by 10%...

speaker: left
text: Atleast it wasn't a failure.

speaker: right
text: That's the definition of a fail.

speaker: left
text: Not as much as your name.

speaker: left
text: Critical hit, get destroyed.

speaker: right
text: What was this conversation even originally about?

speaker: left
text: Me, epically, asking how to use a bow without without epically shooting myself.

speaker: right
text: Well, I'm not actually sure what advice to give, you for that.

speaker: right
text: Don't aim the bow at yourself?

speaker: right
text: Not sure why you'd do that but...

speaker: left
text: No no no no no...

speaker: left
text: I wouldn't do something so simple like that.

speaker: left
text: I use the bow normally, but then have the arrows somehow end up hitting me.

speaker: right
text: ...how?

speaker: left
text: Here, let me show y...

speaker: right
text: N O .

speaker: right
text: Do not ever let him even near a bow.

speaker: right
text: Okay?

speaker: left
text: (This is why I don't talk to Wodahs...)

speaker: left
text: (Fael is such a bad archer, he doesn't even know how to shoot himself smh...)
[Wodahs, Fael, and Repins leveled up!]
